welcome: Aspiring Front-End Developer proficient in web technologies with an emphasis on crafting user-centric experiences.
about: Although sticking to familiar methods is easy and comfortable, I believe it limits growth. I am 'Lee Seunghwan', who consciously strives to step out of my comfort zone by trying new things.

htmlCss.styledComponentsProficient: Proficient in using styled-components for CSS-in-JS styling solutions.

javaScript.domApiSkill: Skilled in handling DOM API without jQuery.

typeScript.integrationProficiency: Proficient in integrating and using TypeScript with various frameworks and libraries.

react.functionComponents: Primarily constructs components as functions and sensibly decomposes components.
react.stateManagement: Manages state using Context Api, Zustand, and Recoil.

additionalTools.stateManagementTools: Proficient in Recoil and Zustand for advanced state management.
additionalTools.reactQueryExperience: Experienced with React-Query for asynchronous data fetching and caching.
additionalTools.webpackSkill: Skilled in bundling and optimization using Webpack5.
additionalTools.styledComponentsExpertise: Expert in styled-components for CSS-in-JS styling solutions.
